Welcome to my website

Her abstract works are colorful, spacious and serene. They have often a rural theme. She took classes with Bianca Snip and Marianne van den Wijngaard.

"I choose color and composition based entirely on my feelings at that particular moment. I compose my painting of multiple layers of paint. By polishing and brushing, the lower layers surface again. In this way I create an inspired and seasoned image while maintaining an uncomplicated and quiet atmosphere. This is what I would like to communicate to the viewer. I often use different kinds of mediums."

"I get my inspiration from nature with all its colors and shades. For me painting equals pure passion and pleasure. Itâ€™s an enormous wealth to have the opportunity to clear my head in this way. I could not do without it anymore!"

"Enjoy!"
